name: Alik Gunashian
description:
'''Alik Yashayi Gunashian''' or '''Gyunashyan''' ({{langx|hy|Ալիկ Յաշայի Գյունաշյան}}; born December 8, 1954) is an [[Armenia]]n popular singer.

He started his career in the local clubs and restaurants of Leninakan (now called [[Gyumri]]) as an amateur singer. His [[Bootleg recording|bootlegs]] and unofficial MC-recordings made his name popular since the [[USSR|Soviet]] times. Among his most famous songs were "Leninakan", "Dzerutyun", "Yerkrasharzh", "Dadarel en jragners", "Dajan kyank e", and "Mi dzaghik er". After the [[1988 Armenian earthquake|1988 Spitak earthquake]], he moved to [[Los Angeles]], where he formed a folk band and recorded a number of CD's.
